items.sentence: Tom put a Band-Aid over his small tattoo of a spider so he would be allowed into a Japanese hot spring.
Tom is finding his new job very demanding, and he often finds it difficult to find time for his family.
The band featured Tom on guitar, Mary on bass guitar and vocals, John on drums, and Alice on keyboards.
To make up for his unpleasant experiences in the hospital, Tom drank a little more than he should have.
Tom told me Mary was good at playing the piano, but I didn't really believe him until I heard her play.
